text: The Macedonian vimba (Vimba melanops), also called the malam√≠da, is a vimba in the family Cyprinidae. It is found in Thessaly, Macedonia and Thrace. == References == Category:IUCN Red List data deficient species Category:Cypriniformes Category:Ray-finned fish Category:Freshwater fish
title: Macedonian vimba
